channel.title: Motorcycle on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff
channel.description: Recent content in Motorcycle on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff

item.title: Circuito Ricardo Tormo - Valencia
item.description: After many years of thinking about it we finally got to the Circuito Ricardo Tormo. We had a great day, everything being free certainly helped the racing was ok with the Moto 3 and Moto 2 being the best by far. {{ more }}

item.title: Flat Track
item.description: {{ more }} Requena for the Flat track which I heard about from Denis Noyes in the USA. A pretty low key meeting with none of the named riders turning up great track but poor racing on a bitterly cold windy day. It had rained over night which made the track very slippery until it started to dry.I reckon the guys from home would have cleaned up.

item.title: A Spin on Ronda
item.description: First Ride on Ronda for a long time perfect day for it, not even much traffic.
